Description:
Our client is the leading Bank in UAE. They are now looking for a Court Orders and Certificates Specialist to join them. Roles & Responsibilities Manage court orders and governmental authorities’ requests. This includes receiving requests, checking court orders, name searching, processing the requests and follow-up to direct all court orders to the checker.
Timely reporting to concerned parties on relevant operational risk, fraud, AML and other related issues accurately and efficiently.
Timely reporting to Central Bank for all Customer Information Requests and Commercial Building Reporting.
Issuance of police letters and providing the police with the required information based on requests received from Financial Information Unit and Dubai Police Portal.
Ease Experts assigned by the courts job by coordinating with other departments and providing them with all requested documentation.
Perform any other task as requested by direct manager.Salary: AED 5000 - AED 6500Skills
Skills:
A clear understanding of retail banking and branch network processes.
An understanding of all kinds of Court processes
An understanding of Central Bank’s processes with regards to the AML SCU

Bachelor's Degree from an internationally recognized educational institute
Minimum of 2 years’ experience in a Banking environment.
Effective communication skills in English and Arabic
